Dear marketing/public relation team of [BRAND],

As a long-time customer of 品牌名, I am writing to express my concern over the brand's sponsorship of local key opinion leader Spoon Chan (@khengchan_) who has been criticised for plagiarism and dishonesty.

Since 2018, netizens have accused Spoon Chan of stealing fashion and photography ideas from other local influencers, including Pumpkin Jenn (@pumpkinjenn) and Tina Wang (@tinawzq).

Spoon Chan was also dismissed for selling second-hand clothes and bags that were marked up more expensive than the original in April 2020. Many commenters online believed that she misled the readers with the fake "original prices" claimed.

The respect for originality is of vital in the creative industry, while honesty is a fundamental virtue. It is utterly disappointing that your brand has selected such a dishonest figure to represent you.

I would be very grateful if the marketing/public relations team considers stopping any cooperation and sponsorship with the influencer concerned.

Dear marketing/public relation team of [BRAND],

As a long-time customer of 品牌名, I am writing to express my concern over the brand's sponsorship of local key opinion leader Spoon Chan (@khengchan_) who has been criticised for plagiarism and dishonesty.

Since 2018, netizens have accused Spoon Chan of stealing fashion and photography ideas from other local influencers, including Pumpkin Jenn (@pumpkinjenn) and Tina Wang (@tinawzq).

Spoon Chan was also dismissed for selling second-hand clothes and bags that were marked up more expensive than the original in April 2020. Many commenters online believed that she misled the readers with the fake "original prices" claimed.

The respect for originality is of vital in the creative industry, while honesty is a fundamental virtue. It is utterly disappointing that your brand has selected such a dishonest figure to represent you.

I would be very grateful if the marketing/public relations team considers stopping any cooperation and sponsorship with the influencer concerned.

As a long-time customer of 品牌名, I am writing to express my concern over the brand's sponsorship of local key opinion leader Spoon Chan (@khengchan_) who has been criticised for plagiarism and dishonesty.

Since 2018, netizens have accused Spoon Chan of stealing fashion and photography ideas from other local influencers, including Pumpkin Jenn (@pumpkinjenn) and Tina Wang (@tinawzq).

Spoon Chan was also dismissed for selling second-hand clothes and bags that were marked up more expensive than the original in April 2020. Many commenters online believed that she misled the readers with the fake "original prices" claimed.

The respect for originality is of vital in the creative industry, while honesty is a fundamental virtue. It is utterly disappointing that your brand has selected such a dishonest figure to represent you.

Email subject: 自己寫 否則會比system filter走

Dear marketing/public relation team of [BRAND],

As a long-time customer of 品牌名, I am writing to express my concern over the brand's sponsorship of local key opinion leader Spoon Chan (@khengchan_) who has been criticised for plagiarism and dishonesty.

Since 2018, netizens have accused Spoon Chan of stealing fashion and photography ideas from other local influencers, including Pumpkin Jenn (@pumpkinjenn) and Tina Wang (@tinawzq).

Spoon Chan was also dismissed for selling second-hand clothes and bags that were marked up more expensive than the original in April 2020. Many commenters online believed that she misled the readers with the fake "original prices" claimed.

The respect for originality is of vital in the creative industry, while honesty is a fundamental virtue. It is utterly disappointing that your brand has selected such a dishonest figure to represent you.

I would be very grateful if the marketing/public relations team considers stopping any cooperation and sponsorship with the influencer concerned.

Dear marketing/public relation team of [BRAND],

As a long-time customer of 品牌名, I am writing to express my concern over the brand's sponsorship of local key opinion leader Spoon Chan (@khengchan_) who has been criticised for plagiarism and dishonesty.

Since 2018, netizens have accused Spoon Chan of stealing fashion and photography ideas from other local influencers, including Pumpkin Jenn (@pumpkinjenn) and Tina Wang (@tinawzq).

Spoon Chan was also dismissed for selling second-hand clothes and bags that were marked up more expensive than the original in April 2020. Many commenters online believed that she misled the readers with the fake "original prices" claimed.

The respect for originality is of vital in the creative industry, while honesty is a fundamental virtue. It is utterly disappointing that your brand has selected such a dishonest figure to represent you.

I would be very grateful if the marketing/public relations team considers stopping any cooperation and sponsorship with the influencer concerned.
